original_text: David and his men continued to walk along the road. Shimei walked along the side of the hill, near the road. As he went, he cursed David and he threw stones and dirt at David and his people.
korean_text: 다윗과 그의 추종자들이 길을 갈 때에 시므이는 산비탈로 따라가면서 저주하고 그를 향하여 돌을 던지며 먼지를 날리더라

sentences.original_text: David and his men continued to walk along the road.
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗과 그의 사람들은 길을 따라 계속 걸어갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: Shimei walked along the side of the hill.
As he went, he cursed David.
He threw stones at David and his people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다윗과 그의 백성에게 돌을 던졌습니다.

sentences.original_text: He threw dirt at David and his people.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다윗과 그의 백성에게 흙을 던졌습니다.
